resources.string:
I. Introduction of this game:
	This game is a level-designed game.The levels can be unlocked sequentially.The unlocked level can be challenged repeatedly.
New Game：Start a new game from level 1.
Level Selection：The unlocked level can be selected to play again.

II. The rule of connection:\n\tThere is an equation in each level.Please find a pair of numbers which is the solution ☆(didn\'t need to be ordered).If the numbers player chose can be connected with three straight lines(or below), these numbers will eliminate.

III. The rule of score:\n\tPlayer can get 20 points when eliminating each pair of numbers.If the player clears all numbers in a specific time, player can get 1.5 times of the total score in this level.
